description_jp:
次に発動するSP特技で獲得するボルテージが自身のテクニックの20%増加
条件:自身のクリティカル時 確率:20%
description_en:
The Voltage gained from the next SP Skill increases by 20% of own Technique
Condition: On Own Critical
Chance: 20%

effect.display: Gain 20% of Technique as extra Voltage on next SP skill
effect.formatting: Gain {effect} of Technique as extra Voltage on next SP skill
